flawed_nl_solution:
After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=200>>200 people left.
The 200 people will eat 200/300 = 1/3 as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
The 60 days' worth of food will last this smaller group for 60 days / (1/3) = <<60/(1/3)=180>>180 more days.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2/3, not 1/3. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
